name: C:CADA
description:
I made this for the BenBonk Game Jam 2.

The theme was limited space, and I expressed this as making movement your only resource. Unfortunately, the game is missing the final element bring all the aspects together, enemies, due to over-scoping. Oh well. I will probably implement it after the Jam.

Credits to @Polar for giving me a hand with the art assets

Controls is

-ARROW KEYS to move

- The x1,x2 and x3 are coins. Everything else are power-ups that affect your movement.

 I aim to clean up the sprites, some UI improvements and a Tutorial before the Jam ends, but I at least wanted to upload a playable version first. Thank you! I'm glad to have been able to do this as my first GameJam experience
